dcterms:creator: A. Brajdic
R. Harle
dcterms:description: A dataset for walk detection and step counting collected from 27 subjects using the built-in accelerometer of an Android smartphone, sampled at 100 Hz under six different smartphone placements. It contains 117 samples of accelerometer signals labeled with the start and end time of the walk and the number of steps.
dcterms:title: WDSC

dcterms:creator: G. H. Flores
R. Manduchi
dcterms:description: An annotated dataset collected from 15 subjects, including both sighted and blind individuals, while walking ten different paths. The dataset includes accelerometer, gyroscope, and magnetometer data recorded at 25 Hz, with a total of 932 samples categorized by subject type.
dcterms:title: WeAllWalk

dcterms:creator: R. Mattfeld
E. Jesch
A. Hoover
dcterms:description: A dataset collected from 30 subjects wearing Shimmer3 sensors on their wrist, hip, and ankle, recording accelerometer and gyroscope data at 15 Hz. It includes different walking regularities: regular, semi-regular, and unstructured, with a total of 270 samples.
dcterms:title: Pedometer
